model

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Person
      • model.User

  • public class User
extends Person
    This class represents a user of the library, allowing them to borrow copies of recourses and make payments towards any fines against them. It has all the attributes and methods of the Person class with the inclusion of the account balance behaviour.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Charles Day
